law.catch_line: Validity of agreements extending limitations periods.
law.text: Written agreements entered into in good faith and at arms length to extend limitations periods for the filing of civil actions, including agreements entered into prior to July 15, 1988, shall be valid and enforceable according to their terms.
law.history: Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 268, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1988.
